subject: SST
title: Colloquium
info: Series of weekly lectures by nationally and internationally known scholars with diverse disciplinary and methodological backgrounds speaking on a variety of issues.

subject: SST
title: Sem: Models, Theories, Reality
info: Students participate in ongoing research on the role of models and theories in science, and prepare and present research papers.
prereqInfo: prereq: HSci 8111 or [Phil 8601 or Phil 8602 or Phil 8605] or instr consent

subject: SST
title: Sem: Phil Phys Scien
info: Students participate in ongoing research in history, philosophy, and social study of physical sciences and prepare and present research papers.

subject: SST
title: Sem: Biological/Biomed Sci
info: Students participate in ongoing research in history, philosophy, and social study of biological and biomedical sciences, and prepare and present research papers.
prereqInfo: prereq: HSci 8111 or [Phil 8601 or Phil 8602 or Phil 8605] or instr consent

subject: SST
title: Sem: Science, Tech, Society
info: Students participate in ongoing research on interactions involving science, technology, and society from perspectives of history, philosophy, and social study of science, and prepare and present research papers.
prereqInfo: prereq: HSci 8111 or [Phil 8601 or Phil 8602 or Phil 8605] or instr consent

subject: SST
title: Soc & Cult Stud Sci
info: Recent work; theoretical and methodological differences among practitioners; selected responses from historians and philosophers of science.
